did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: University of Virginia Office of the Vice President for Business and Finance Office Administrative Files 1909, [1953]-1980

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student and employee records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.) and the Freedom of Information Act (F.O.I.A.). In addition, the collection may contain confidential donor information.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Use restrictions may apply to specific student and employee records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.) and the Freedom of Information Act (F.O.I.A.). In addition, the collection may contain confidential donor information.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Virginia Office of the Vice President for Business and Finance Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-5/1/1.831, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was an archival transfer from the Office of the Vice President, 1983 December 16.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence files of the Vice President for Business and Finance and Chief Operating Officer and include an alphabetical file for each biennium, along with separate files the Auditor of Public Accounts, Business and Auxiliary services and State office files.
